response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value for us, and we believe it would be equally valuable to you. We are offering this product to you at a special price of $950,000, which represents a significant discount compared to its true worth of $1,000,000. We understand the importance of making a deal that benefits both parties, and we are confident that this offer will meet your expectations while ensuring a fair return for us. Please let us know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 950000}
